root.name: Air Hockey-e
root.description: Air Hockey-e was a game for the Nintendo e-Reader that was free from Toys R Us in the United States; Australia found the game included with the e-Reader.GameplayThe game was simple and lacked any real options; Fairly difficult AI, and no option for Link Play. It did, however, include sound effects and MIDI music with two swipes of that magical card. The first player to score 10 points win the game.
